data_table.description: Visit 2. Subject ID, type of finding, and infarct size of participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MRF12
variable.description: Infarct size in the right/left direction

variable.name: MRF13
variable.description: Infarct size in the anterior/posterior direction

variable.name: MRF14
variable.description: Infarct size in the superior/inferior direction
